ComicInfo.Series: The True Lives of the Fabulous Killjoys: National Anthem
ComicInfo.Summary:
The re-assembled Killjoys crew finally enter New York City and come face-to-face with their enemies and their past for a final showdown with reality and their lives in the balance.
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | --------------------------------------------------------------------------- A | Regular Cover | Leonardo Romero & Jordie Bellaire | 1 | B | Variant Cover | Becky Cloonan | 2 | C | Variant Cover | Brian Chippendale | 3 |
